title: Travis Scott blasts claims he cheated on Kylie Jenner after shock split
text:
Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott split recently (Picture: FilmMagic)

Travis Scott has denied cheating on Kylie Jenner after their shock split.

The Highest In The Room rapper and Keeping Up With The Kardashians star – who share daughter Stormi – dated for two-and-a-half- years before calling time on their relationship.

And the 28-year-old has now hit out at claims he was unfaithful to the Lip Kit queen, 22, after speculation over his friendship with pal Rojean Kar – who is known as YungSweetRo on social media.

Taking to his Instagram story, he broke his silence over their break-up, revealing the rumours had been ‘affecting’ him.

‘It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again,’ he told his 20.8million followers.

‘Once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real (sic).’

Travis Scott denied cheating on Kylie Jenner (Picture: Instagram)

According to E! News, Rojean also spoke about the claims on her private Instagram page, begging people to ‘stop spreading lies’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The publication states she posted: ‘None of these rumours are true, it’s just the internet creating a false narrative.

‘Please stop spreading lies & leave him, her & I alone because it’s affecting real lives. Thank you.’

Things came to a head after eagle-eyed fans on Twitter noticed the pair had been popping up in each other’s pictures since way back in 2013.

And in the past year, the model has shared pictures from locations Travis was in immediately after he posted his own snaps.

Yungsweetro was forced to deny the cheat claims on social media (Picture: Instagram)

In March 2018, the dad-of-one shared an image of himself on a ski trip – with Yungsweetro posting a picture from the slopes the following day.

And in August, the 27-year-old posted a picture from a casino – a week after the Sicko Mode rapper was pictured at a casino with similar surroundings.

Fans also claimed that in one selfie, a pair of blue trainers could be seen in her bedroom – shoes that Travis was apparently pictured in at a later date.

In another twist, Yungsweetro even attended his birthday party back in April, which was organised by Kylie herself.

Kylie and Tyga split in 2017 (Picture: Getty)

But Ky has also been met with a wave of speculation surrounding her love life following her split from the rapper, after she was pictured making a late-night visit to the same hotel ex-boyfriend Tyga happened to be recording new music.

Brushing off the rumours, she tweeted: ‘The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

‘Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! Our friendship and our daughter is priority.’

So that’s that, then.

description: Travis Scott has denied cheating on Kylie Jenner after their shock split. The Highest In The Room rapper and Keeping Up With The Kardashians star – who share daughter Stormi...
